Name: Watermelon Country
About the game: See Watermelons! Get Watermelons! Tackle enemies who stand in your way. Watermelon Country is a casual adventure game where you have to use timing and skill to reach the end of each level. Love Watermelon? Love stylized gaming filters then give this a go!
